name: redis-ai-trading-bot
description: RSI Divergence Trading Bot with Redis AI and 2% Risk Management

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:redis" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:redis: docker start redis-trading-stack || docker run -d --name redis-trading-stack -p 6379:6379 -p 8001:8001 redis/redis-stack:latest
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:contracts && npm run setup:python
scripts.check-services: docker ps && echo 'Redis Status:' && docker exec redis-trading-stack redis-cli ping

author: Trading Bot Developer
